GITLAB_HOST_DESC: The hostname of the GitLab server
GITLAB_WEB_HOST_PORT_DESC: The port of the GitLab server. Defaults to 10080
GITLAB_SSH_HOST_PORT_DESC: The ssh port number. Defaults to 10022
GITLAB_ROOT_EMAIL_DESC: The Email for the root user
GITLAB_ROOT_EMAIL_MSG: Please enter a valid email address
GITLAB_ROOT_PASSWD_DESC: The password for the root user
GITLAB_SMTP_ENABLED_DESC: Enable mail delivery via SMTP. Defaults to true if SMTP_USER is defined, else defaults to false
GITLAB_SMTP_HOST_DESC: SMTP server host. Defaults to smtp.gmail.com
